articles.title: Amitabh Bachchan's condition before marrying Jaya: Don't want wife who will work 9-5 - India Today
articles.description: Amitabh Bachchan and Jaya Bachchan have been married for 51 years now However before marriage Amitabh put a condition in front of Jaya
articles.content: Bollywood superstar Amitabh Bachchan married Jaya Bachchan on June 3, 1973. But before marrying her, the 'Sholay' actor had a condition. He didn't want his wife to work regular hours after marriage. … [+1977 chars]
